title: Strengthening Clinical Practice Competencies: Language Proficiency Development through Technology-Enhanced Experiential Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can write explanatory texts using over 20 language expressions related to historical contexts after experiencing VR-based virtual field trips.
Learners can perform dialogue scenarios using over 15 job-related vocabulary items in role-playing activities with programming robots.
Learners can complete a 3+ minute presentation incorporating language learning content into storyboards created with digital tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
